name: Deepsea Blade
author: CrusaderDroid
desc:
You create in your hand an incredibly thin blade of highly-pressurized water. You can attack with it as a mage weapon. It has a range of 60 feet, and when it strikes a target, deals 6d4 slashing damage to creatures within 10 feet, 4d4 slashing damage to creatures between 10 to 30 feet, and 2d4 slashing damage to creatures between 30 to 60 feet.

If the blade passes through any water or Water spell during an attack, the cavitation caused by the blade's sheer pressure additionally deals 2d12 fire damage to all creatures within 10 feet of the points of impact. You can't damage yourself in this manner.

If you know the Streaming Needle spell, you can cast it at the same time as this spell without additional AP or MP cost.
empower: Grants the Lethal property to the blade. Also grants the Lethal property to Streaming Needle, if active.
